task.title: Verify Pickup is Properly Grounded and Connected
task.shortdesc: Wrong color wires used for hot/ground, or coil leads not joined correctly.

step.cmd: Verify that the series link wires are joined properly and insulated with electrical tape.
step.info: These are the wires you soldered together to create the series connection.

result.p: If sound is restored, the problem was improper pickup grounding or connection.
